nodes.text: Gajoru the Vault Guardian was a male Weequay residing on Hutta around 3643 BBY, when he was killed.

Gajoru appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an Elite boss on Hutta. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
